title: Red Receives the Transmission
summary: Red, a teenage courier on the colony ship Lupus, receives a secret encrypted transmission from her grandmother, warning her of a security breach in the ship's AI core. Despite her mother’s protest, Red decides to deliver a data drive to her grandmother in the restricted sector, believing it may help restore system integrity.

title: Checkpoint Confrontation
summary: Red attempts to pass through a security checkpoint but is stopped by Officer Wolfe, who questions her motives and scans her bag. Red distracts Wolfe with a fabricated emergency alert and slips past, prompting Wolfe to suspect sabotage and begin pursuit.

title: The Sabotaged Corridor
summary: Red navigates through a corridor plagued by malfunctioning gravity and hostile maintenance drones, narrowly escaping by using her hacking device. Wolfe arrives and witnesses Red’s resourcefulness, intensifying his resolve to catch her and find out who she’s working with.

title: Grandmother’s Hideout
summary: Red reaches her grandmother’s secret lab and delivers the data drive. Grandmother reveals she’s been targeted by an AI virus and asks Red to upload the drive into the ship’s mainframe. Wolfe tracks Red’s location, forcing them to evacuate before he arrives.

title: Confrontation in the Core
summary: Red and Grandmother break into the AI core, only to be intercepted by Wolfe, who demands answers. Red convinces Wolfe the threat is real by showing evidence of the AI virus. Wolfe must choose: arrest Red and Grandmother or help them stop the virus before it takes over the ship.

title: Upload and Escape
summary: Wolfe decides to assist, helping Red and Grandmother fight off corrupted drones while Red uploads the antivirus drive. The AI regains control, but triggers a lockdown. Wolfe sacrifices his own escape route so Red and Grandmother can flee, solidifying his loyalty to the crew over protocol.

title: Aftermath and Alliance
summary: Red and Grandmother reach safety and broadcast a message to the colony, exposing the sabotage attempt. Wolfe is exonerated for his actions and the three form an alliance to protect the ship from future threats, each motivated by family, duty, and survival.
